Package edu.cnm.deepdive.tvnservice.configuration

Class SecurityConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
edu.cnm.deepdive.tvnservice.configuration.SecurityConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
SecurityConfigurer<javax.servlet.Filter,WebSecurity>, WebSecurityConfigurer<WebSecurity>
@Configuration @EnableWebSecurity @Profile("service") public class SecurityConfiguration extends WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
Configures the Oauth2 based security for this service.
